text: Trap for Cinderella may refer to: * Trap for Cinderella (novel), by Sébastien Japrisot, 1962 * Trap for Cinderella (1965 film), a French adaptation of the novel, directed by André Cayatte * Trap for Cinderella (2013 film), a British adaptation of the novel, directed by Iain Softley
title: Trap for Cinderella
